data.text: I have a mild rash on my arms; it's not severe.
I noticed some redness and itching on my skin, but it's not too severe.
I have a few small pimples on my face; it's not a severe breakout.
I've been experiencing dry and itchy skin, but it's manageable.
I have a severe allergic reaction with hives all over my body.
I developed a large and painful boil on my thigh; it's very severe.
I have a persistent rash with blisters; it's causing a lot of discomfort.
I noticed a severe skin discoloration on my face; it's quite alarming.
I have a mild case of eczema on my hands; it's not too severe yet.
I woke up with a severe skin infection on my leg; it's red and swollen.
